definition: Jura mountains of eastern France and extending into Switzerland

sentences.english: The primitive and uncivilized nature of my life made me feel like a giant reptile during the Cretaceous or Jurassic periods.
sentences.chinese: 其荒莽无文，恍若白垩纪侏罗纪的一只大爬虫。

sentences.english: The natural gas enrichment of Jurassic depression in the west of Sichuan is mainly controlled by lithofacies.
sentences.chinese: 川西坳陷侏罗系天然气富集主要受岩相控制。

sentences.english: Okay , now the Mastodon is from the semi - late Jurassic period.
sentences.chinese: 接下来这头乳齿象是来自侏罗纪中后期。

sentences.english: Allosaurus was the top predatory dinosaur of the late Jurassic period in North America.
sentences.chinese: 异龙是最大的掠夺性恐龙的晚侏罗纪期间在北美地区。

sentences.english: Coal measures in Xiaonan coalmine belong to Jurassic terrestrial deposit.
sentences.chinese: 晓南煤矿含煤地层属侏罗系陆相沉积。

sentences.english: Is spielberg's Jurassic Park razor- clawed Velociraptor an accurate portrayal?
sentences.chinese: 《侏罗纪公园》中，描述的速龙是否正确？

sentences.english: It is spatially related to Jurassic Zhiluo Formation with braided palaeochannel systems.
sentences.chinese: 空间上，它与侏罗纪直罗组辫状古河道体系有关。

sentences.english: The museum stores nearly all species of dinosaurs living in Jurassic.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆几乎收藏了侏罗纪所有的恐龙的化石。

sentences.english: The palaeogeomorphic form of the pre-Jurassic was reconstructed by the method of mold.
sentences.chinese: 应用印模法恢复了鄂尔多斯盆地前侏罗纪古地貌形态。

sentences.english: Stegosaurus lived in the Jurassic period, the middle period of dinosaur history.
sentences.chinese: 剑龙生活在恐龙时代的中期侏罗纪时代。

sentences.english: Uranium mineralizations are hosted in the Middle-Lower Jurassic coal-bearing series.
sentences.chinese: 下侏罗统含煤系是铀矿化赋存的有利部位。

sentences.english: The deposit occurs in the upper part of the Jurassic coal-bearing strata.
sentences.chinese: 赋存在侏罗系含煤地层的上部。

sentences.english: The Lower and Middle Jurassic contain the hydrocarbon source rock.
sentences.chinese: 烃源岩发育于中下侏罗统中。

sentences.english: The Aardonyx celestae species dates back to the early Jurassic period.
sentences.chinese: 莎莉丝特地爪龙可追溯至侏罗纪早期。

sentences.english: The top boundary of Jurassic is delimitated between the lower and middle part of Datonghe Formation.
sentences.chinese: 侏罗系上界暂定在大通河组下部与中部之间。

sentences.english: Taibei Say was the depositional center of Turpan-Harmi Basin after Jurassic.
sentences.chinese: 台北凹陷在侏罗纪以后成为吐哈盆地的沉积中心。

definition: Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
third period/tertiary (geological era since the extinction of the dinosaurs at the Cretaceous-Tertiary boundary 65 million years ago)
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
Triassic (geological period 250-205m years ago)/also written 三疊紀|三叠纪
Sinian (c. 800-542 million years ago), late phase of pre-Cambrian geological era
Permian (geological period 292-250m years ago)/also written 二疊紀|二叠纪
Ordovician system (geology)/see 奧陶紀|奥陶纪
